title: Gregory.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Hello there

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Hey

title: Gregory.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
*sigh*

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
You alright Gregory?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
No, of course not

title: Gregory.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Gregory.AddToEscapeQuest]]
<<endif>>
[[Not really...|Gregory.EndDialog]]

title: Gregory.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Hello Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Hey Gregory
Did you sleep well?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
No emma I didn't
But thanks for asking
I'm glad we can at least give a shit about each other

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Likewise

title: Gregory.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Hello Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Hey Gregory
So, uh, where you from?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Where am I "from"?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
A little prarie town in the Northlands. 

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Oh, what's the name of the place?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Why do you care?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
I was just...asking

title: Gregory.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I slept like crap last night

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
I didn't for once

body:

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
....

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
what's good about it?
[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Gregory.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Hey

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Why do you keep bothering me?
are you trying to do something?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
No, just trying to get to know you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
Why? I'll probably be dead soon

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
...ok

[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Gregory.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
How did you end up, uh, enslaved
I guess I'm curious

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
...Why? 

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
We got nothing else to talk about

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I don't want to talk about it
[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>

title: Gregory.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
You really wanna know how I ended up here?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Uh

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I .... I sold myself
It happened after like the 3rd bad harvest
we just didn't have any money anymore
turned up at the bank and just handed myself over

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Oh...oh shit

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
The broker kept telling me he could get me into some kind of easy work
Well, it wasn't.

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
I'm so sorry
I mean, my family had the same problem
we had a few bad harvests and my number came up

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
At least you didn't have a choice
You don't have any regrets

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
No, I guess not
But did you really have a choice either?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I don't know. I'll never know
<<CampEventController upgradeWeaponLevel>>
[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>

...how?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I did, just don't mention it, to anyone
[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Gregory.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
...
sure whatever

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I don't wanna talk about anything right now

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>

[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Gregory.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
You still don't want to talk?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
....
Sure fine
I'm a real asshole huh?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
Sort of, I mean, i don't blame you
I keep bothering you after all

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
I feel so angry all the time
not just at the guards, the whole system
but myself, I'm angry at myself for giving in

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_silent>>
yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer gregory_default_talking>>
....
[[....|Gregory.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Gregory.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Gregory>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

body: Later
